product.name: Neapolitan Pizza

product.description: A traditional Italian-style pizza originating from Naples, characterized by a thin crust, soft center, and fresh toppings such as San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella (preferably buffalo mozzarella), and basil.

reviews.title: Best Pizza Ever!
reviews.description: The crust was crispy, the toppings were fresh, and the cheese was perfectly melted. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Delicious but a bit oily
reviews.description: Loved the flavors and the ingredients, but it was slightly oily for my preference.

reviews.title: Average Taste
reviews.description: The pizza was okay, but the base was a little too thick, and the sauce lacked flavor.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.description: The pizza was cold by the time it arrived, and the toppings were not as described.

reviews.title: Terrible Experience
reviews.description: The pizza was burnt, and the delivery was late. Would not order again.
